headline: BREAKING: Capitol Police Release Horrifying New Audio, Video And Photos Of Shooting Death Of Ashli Babbitt
sentences:
So, you’re going to have to suck it up, bud, and take it.”
Tucker Carlson, Aaron Babbitt (Ashli Babbitt's Husband), And Terrell Roberts (Babbitt Family Attorney) React To The Interview With The Capitol Hill Police Officer Who Shot & Killed Ashli Babbitt pic.twitter.com/MCCqr6Skq4
— The Columbia Bugle (@ColumbiaBugle) August 27, 2021
“Tucker Carlson also noted that Byrd is the same officer who previously left his loaded weapon in a bathroom at the Capitol building in 2019,” the report from GP went on to state.

He then stated it was ‘disheartening’ and stated he was just ‘doing my job.’
Aaron Babbitt did not waste any time issuing a response to the officer, stating he needs to “suck it up.”
In an exclusive interview with @LesterHoltNBC, Capitol Police Lieutenant Michael Byrd describes why he’s choosing to identify himself.

pic.twitter.com/x3neLZ5pnF
— Justice For Ashli Babbitt (@ForAshli) August 23, 2021
EXCLUSIVE: Mother of Ashli Babbitt tells National File "My daughter died for this cause… I'm here to be my daughter's voice because it has been silenced" before Rep. Paul Gosar invited her out today.

“Last month, also as a result of this lawsuit, Judicial Watch released records from the DC Police about the shooting death of Babbitt, showing that multiple officers claimed they didn’t see a weapon in Babbitt’s hand before Byrd shot her, and Byrd was visibly distraught afterward.

pic.twitter.com/lSMC5ChwCy
— National File (@NationalFile) July 24, 2021
Standing ovation for the mother of Ashli Babbitt here in Arizona pic.twitter.com/koETCwGNoa
— Jack Posobiec (@JackPosobiec) July 24, 2021
This whole thing is a miscarriage of justice.

This report featured a story concerning Aaron Babbitt, the husband of Ashli Babbitt, when he appeared on Tucker Carlson’s Fox News program where he issued a response to an interview from MSNBC with the murderer of his wife, Lt. Michael Byrd.

pic.twitter.com/5E7KPtxNc2
— NBC Nightly News with Lester Holt (@NBCNightlyNews) August 26, 2021
“I don’t even want to hear him talk about how he’s getting death threats and he’s scared,” Aaron Babbitt went on to say passionately.

“On Monday Judicial Watch revealed that they have received multiple audio, visual and photo records from the DC Metropolitan Police Department about the shooting death of Ashli Babbitt,” the GP report said.
What’s really disgusting is that Byrd isn’t just walking free, but that he somehow managed to raise up $122,000 on a GoFundMe campaign after he murdered Babbitt in cold blood.
For those who might not remember, as the media has done a good job of burying the story, Ashli Babbitt was a Trump supporter as well as a veteran of the U.S. military.
(TeaParty.org Exclusive) – Back in July, there was a report from the Gateway Pundit that confirmed Ashli Babbitt’s shooter was Lt. Mike Byrd of the Capitol Police.
The man gave her no warning and then he fled from the scene of the shooting, plus he fired on an unarmed woman who was not posing any sort of physical threat.

PRESS RELEASE
ATTORNEY FOR ASHLI BABBITT'S FAMILY, TERRY ROBERTS RESPONSE TO THE US CAPITOL POLICE INTERNAL INVESTIGATION OF THE KILLING OF ASHLI BABBITT.
And let’s face it, the media would have been all over this had Babbitt been black and a part of Black Lives Matter and the police officer had been white.
“The documents also include photos of the area where Babbitt was killed and DC police photographs of Lt. Byrd, his hands, and his gun.
In other words, Byrd is responsible for killing Ashli Babbitt in cold blood back on Jan. 6, 2021 inside the U.S. Capitol building.
Byrd shares his account of the January 6 riot, as officers barricaded the door and he fired a single shot, killing Ashli Babbitt.
The records include a new cell phone video, which was edited by the DC police, that shows the police reacting to the shooting.
The records also include internal communications about Byrd’s case and a crime scene examination report,” the report stated.
“I’ve been getting death threats since Jan. 7 — two, three, five, 10 a day — and all I did on Jan. 6 was become a widower.
There is also an audio recording of an interview of Lt. Michael Byrd by the DC Metropolitan Police on January 6, 2021.
She was found to be unarmed and was no threat whatsoever to the police or anyone else who was present at the protest.
“During the interview with Byrd, he stated that he saved ‘countless lives’ by murdering Babbitt, who was unarmed.
According to the Gateway Pundit, Byrd was exonerated of the shooting back in August for murdering Ashli Babbitt.
If BLM would have taken action like some of these violent protesters, they would have been hailed as heroes.
The photos also include pictures of a folding knife reportedly found in Babbitt’s pocket,” the report said.
Other audio interviews of witnesses to the incident provide first-hand accounts of what transpired.
There were several police officers all around her when she was shot without any sort of just cause.
The voices in these audio recordings are all digitally altered in order to hide their identities.
He then started to whine that he’s been receiving death threats since the shooting happened.
One officer attested that he didn’t hear any verbal commands before Byrd shot Babbitt.
Let’s hope the Babbitt family gets some kind of closure over what happened to Ashli.
Lt. Byrd should be in a prison cell right now for the murder of an unarmed woman.
Today’s records include audio recordings of these witness interviews.
